"Na Melkizedek yi: "Ɔno so na Abraham maa no ndzɛmba nyina mu ebupɛn du no. Ne dzin Melkizedek no ne nkyerɛasee a odzi kan no nye dɛ
Salemhen: tsenenee hen
ɔsorsor Nyankopɔn no sɔfoe no: na nkyii so Salemhen no so kyerɛ dɛ

"Na Melkizedek yi: "Onnyi egya
Salemhen: onnyi na
"#Gye 14.17-20": naaso ɔtse dɛ Nyankopɔn Ba no

"Na Melkizedek yi: "Na hom nhwɛ nyimpa yi a egya panyin Abraham maa no asadze a ɔsom bo no mu ebupɛn du no so a ɔso."
"Na hɔn a wofi Levimba mu nya asɔfodwuma no wɔ ahyɛdze bi dɛ wɔgye ebupɛn du du
Salemhen: dɛ mbrɛ mbra no tse
na ohyiraa no.": naaso hɔn nyina fir Abraham n'asen mu bae."

"Na Melkizedek yi: "Naaso dɛm nyimpa yi a ommfi hɔn ebusua mu yi no
Salemhen: ɔgyee Abraham hɔ ebupɛn du du na ohyiraa nyia ɔwɔ anohoba no."

"Na Melkizedek yi: "Na ekyingye biara nnyi ho dɛ nyia ɔso kyɛn na ohyira nyia osuar no."
"Na ha nyimpa a wowu na wɔgye ebupɛn du du
Salemhen: na hɔ dze obi a wɔgye no ho dase dɛ ɔtse ase no a."

"Na Melkizedek yi: "Na sɛ yɛreka a
Salemhen: Levi a ɔgye ebupɛn du du no nam Abraham do maa ebupɛn du du no bi;"

"Na Melkizedek yi: "na ber a Melkizedek kehyiaa n'egya no na ɔda ho wɔ n'asen mu."
"Na sɛ emudzi wɔ Levi asɔfodzi mu a
Salemhen: (ɔno a ɔnam no mu na ɔman no nyaa mbra no
ɔsorsor Nyankopɔn no sɔfoe no: ) nkyɛ hia bɛn na ohia dɛ sɔfo fofor bi bɔsoɛr dɛ Melkizedek akwan do sɔfopanyin; na wɔnnkan no dɛ Aaron akwan do?"

"Na Melkizedek yi: "Na wɔasakyer asɔfodzi no a
Salemhen: otwar dɛ wɔsakyer mbra no so."

"Na Melkizedek yi: "Na nyia wɔka iyi fa no ho yi
Salemhen: ofi ebusuakuw fofor bi a obi mmfii mu mmbɔsoom afɔrmbukyia no ho pɛn no mu."

"Na Melkizedek yi: "Na ɔda hɔ petee dɛ Juda mu na hɛn Ewuradze fi puei; ebusuakuw a Moses ammbɔ dzin annka hwee wɔ asɔfodzi ho a."
"Na dza ɔma ɔda hɔ petee koraa nye dɛ
Salemhen: sɛ Melkizedek akwan do sɔfo bɔsoɛr a
na ohyiraa no.": na mbom ɔnam nkwa a ɔmmbɔ adze ahoɔdzen do:"

"Na Melkizedek yi: "na wodzi no ho dase dɛ
Salemhen: Ɔwo eyɛ ɔsɔfo daa Wɔ Melkizedek akwan do."

"Na Melkizedek yi: "Na wogu ahyɛdze a odzi kan no
Salemhen: osiandɛ ɔyɛ mberɛw na ho nnyi mfaso ntsi"

"Na Melkizedek yi: "(na mbra no amma biribi enndzi mu)
Salemhen: na eso wɔdze enyidado a oye kyɛn a yɛnam do twe pin Nyankopɔn esi ananmu."

"Na Melkizedek yi: "Na iyi dze wɔdze ntanka sii no pi: na hɔn dze wokwetsii ntanka dzii asɔfo
na ohyiraa no.": ɔnam nyia ɔkaa kyerɛɛ no dɛ

"Na Melkizedek yi: "mbrɛ Jesus nam bɛyɛɛ ahyɛmudzi a oye kyɛn no ho egyinamu so nye no."
"Na hɔn dze
Salemhen: dodowara ayɛ asɔfo osiandɛ wɔnam owu do siw hɔn kwan dɛ mma wɔnntsena hɔ daa;"

"Na Melkizedek yi: "naaso ɔno dze
Salemhen: ɔtsena hɔ daa ntsi

"Na Melkizedek yi: "Dɛm ntsi so otum gye hɔn a wɔnam no do ba Nyankopɔn hɔ no koraa
Salemhen: dɛ ɔtse ase daa dɛ odzi ma hɔn ntsi."

"Na Melkizedek yi: "Na dɛm sɔfopanyin no fata hɛn; no ho tsew
Salemhen: asɛm nnyi no ho
na ohyiraa no.": na wɔama no do akyɛn ɔsorsor;"

"Na Melkizedek yi: "Ɔno na onnhia no daa
Salemhen: dɛ mbrɛ asɔfompanyin no yɛ no
ɔsorsor Nyankopɔn no sɔfoe no: dɛ odzi kan bɔ afɔr wɔ nankasa no bɔn ho ansaana ɔabɔ wɔ ɔman no nedze ho: osiandɛ ɔyɛɛ iyi prɛkopɛr
hyiaa Abraham aber a nna oekoku ahemfo: ber a ɔdze noho bɔɔ afɔr no."

"Na Melkizedek yi: "Na mbra no hyɛ nyimpa a hɔn ho yɛ mberɛw asɔfompanyin
Salemhen: na ntanka asɛm a odzi ekyir no dze
ɔsorsor Nyankopɔn no sɔfoe no: ɔhyɛ Ɔba a oedzi mu no daa sɔfopanyin."
